Text: how do you watch the movie. im not sure what to do with all these files. and is this legit

probably .rar files? if so you unzip the first one and winrar will unzip the rest all into one file. not sure why people don't just use 1 file, everyone has 2 or 3 terrabytes of storage any more, don't need to save space.

rar won't even make any useful dent in an already compressed movie as all rips are today. I believe it's more of "that the way we've always done it" in some "scene" groups. Some argue it as a file integrity thing. If it won't unrar you know i's corrupt, but bit torrent already insures integrity a high level of confidence. corrupt files you may get were usually already corrupt in the source
